featured.name: Type the Food
featured.description: Mini browser game involving memorizing short menus and typing

featured.name: Ice Cream Game
featured.description: Original Monopoly-like board game. Two players move around the board, buying ice cream flavours and collecting stars

featured.name: Mini Drum Kit
featured.description: In-browser drum kit with a basic Kick, Snare, Hi-Hat, and Crash (sounds from Focusrite)

other.name: inGRADEient
other.description: Mobile app used to obtain feedback about product ingredient labels, made for NW Hacks 2020

other.name: Cookbook Database
other.description: Group project for a databases course at school. A recipe database where users can upload their own recipes and manage their own cookbooks

other.name: Flying Vegetable
other.description: V1 made with Java, V2 made with JavaScript. Mini game where a vegetable files up and down to avoid hitting obstacles
